name: nexus-mcp
description: Nexus MCP server - Intelligent AI model search and discovery with OpenRouter integration

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:compile && bun run build:validate && bun run build:cli-setup
scripts.build:validate: bun -e "import { readdirSync } from 'fs'; readdirSync('dist').forEach(f => console.log('âœ“', f))"
scripts.build:cli-setup: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > dist/cli.tmp && cat dist/cli.js >> dist/cli.tmp && mv dist/cli.tmp dist/cli.js && chmod +x dist/cli.js
scripts.dev: bun run dev:watch & bun run dev:types
scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:integration
scripts.test:npx:local: npm pack && npm install -g ./nexus-mcp-*.tgz && nexus --help && npm uninstall -g nexus-mcp
scripts.release: bun run release:validate && bun run release:build && bun run release:publish
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && bun run release:build && bun run release:publish
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && bun run release:build && bun run release:publish
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && bun run release:build && bun run release:publish
scripts.release:validate: bun run lint && bun run format:check && bun run type-check && bun run secrets:scan && bun run test
